title: Create a Resource Allocation Plan
description: For a new project, an agent must create a resource plan, assigning consultants from a list based on their skills and availability.

tasks.description: Analyze the project requirements to determine the needed skill sets (e.g., 'Financial Analyst', 'Data Scientist').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the required roles for the project.

tasks.description: Review a list of available consultants, their skills, and their availability.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly processes the list of available resources.

tasks.description: Assign specific consultants to the required roles, creating a staffed project team.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a logical team structure, matching skills to roles.
